item.title: H.R. 4978 - Online Privacy Act of 2019
item.description: Authors: Eshoo, Anna G. and Lofgren Published: December 2019 URL: https://www.congress.gov/bill/116th-congress/house-bill/4978/text Abstract: To provide for individual rights relating to privacy of personal information, to establish privacy and security requirements for covered entities relating to personal information, and to establish an agency to be known as the United States Digital Privacy Agency to enforce such rights and requirements, and for other purposes.
